name: final_grade_custom_status
definition: The event gets emitted when a custom status is removed or applied to a student's final grade.
trigger: Triggered when a custom status is applied or removed from a student's final grade.

schema.score_id: The Canvas ID of the score record.
schema.enrollment_id: The Canvas ID of the enrollment record for the student.
schema.user_id: The Canvas user ID of the student.
schema.course_id: The Canvas ID of the course.
schema.grading_period_id: The Canvas ID of the grading period, if applicable.
schema.override_status: The new custom status name applied to a user's final grade
schema.override_status_id: The new custom status ID applied to a user's final grade
schema.old_override_status: The previous custom status name applied to a user's final grade, if applicable
schema.old_override_status_id: The previous custom status ID applied to a user's final grade, if applicable
schema.updated_at: The time when the custom status was applied.

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
